errors.error_description: The instructions suggest saving the example code as `main.py`, but the subsequent `flask run` command will fail because it looks for `app.py` or `wsgi.py` by default.
correction_candidates: Keep the filename as `main.py` and change the run command to `$ flask --app main run`.
Add a line `export FLASK_APP=main.py` before the `flask run` command.
